Translations.Text: Those disbelieve GOD's revelations v schodza Him zufalstvo Moj zlutovanie! They incurred painful retribution
Iba response z jeho ludia bol ich saying Kill him burn him. GOD saved him z zapalit! This zadovazit lekcia zaludnit kto verit

He said Ona kult GOD powerless idols peer pressure iba zavarit some friendship ona v this worldly zivot! Potom Dni Vzkriesenie ona disown jeden iny curse 1 iny Tvoj destiny bol Hell wherein ona nie pomoc 1 iny
Lot verit him said ja emigrating moj Lord He bol Almighty the Vela Wise
My granted him Isaac Jacob my assigned jeho descendants prophethood scriptures my endowed him jeho due recompense v this zivot Hereafter he iste bol s the righteous
Lot said do jeho zaludnit Ona commit such abomination ziaden 1 v the world vzdy robit it ona
Ona practice rod clovek ona commit highway robbery ona allow all laskavy z zverak tvoj society. iba response z jeho ludia bol say Bring do us GOD's retribution ona bol truthful
He said Moj Lord grant mna victory these zlomyselny ludia
